name: Martyr Bots
description:
Made by Steven Miller for The Constraints Jam.

Constraints:

Character can only move along a single axis.

Player has to die at least once every level.

Game must use 3 colors or less.

You play as a Martyr Bot, and your job is simple. You have to blow up. But you can't just blow up anywhere. Sneak through crowds of enemies or take them down one by one as you navigate The Space Explorer 725E. Blow up in the correct location to help your cause and destroy the evil robot overlords.
